statements: UPDATE feedback_survey SET survey_answer = 'Yes' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE feedback_survey SET survey_question = 'How satisfied are you?' WHERE student_id = 5
UPDATE feedback_survey SET survey_answer = 'Excellent' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE feedback_survey SET survey_answer = 'Average', response_date = '2023-10-15 09:30:00' WHERE student_id = 123 AND survey_question = 'How satisfied are you with the course?'
UPDATE surveys SET student_name = 'Alice', course_name = 'Mathematics' WHERE survey_id = 'c8f24d57-32d9-4f0d-848e-68f81e40318a';
UPDATE responses SET response_value = 'Excellent' WHERE response_id = 'e8c1ba79-45f3-4506-bf3a-70f1b1484245';
UPDATE surveys SET student_name = 'John Doe', course_name = 'Mathematics' WHERE survey_id = 'a8c9f4c8-4277-496e-b835-8b789f3b111a';
UPDATE responses SET response_value = 'Agree' WHERE survey_id = 'cd19b27f-8e8f-4ede-b197-48c8a08c4b2c' AND question_number = 1;
UPDATE OnlineSurveys SET feedback = 'Great job!' WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Students SET age = 30, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE student_id = '98765432-1234-5678-aaaa-bbbbbbbbbbbb';
UPDATE OnlineSurveys SET rating = 4, timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Students SET first_name = 'Alice', age = 25, email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE student_id = '78901234-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE survey_responses SET response_text = 'Great feedback' WHERE response_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE students SET email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE student_id = '78901234-5678-9012-3456-789012345678';
UPDATE survey_responses SET response_text = 'New response text' WHERE response_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE students SET last_name = 'Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE feedback_responses SET feedback = 'Updated feedback for response 1' WHERE response_id = 1;
UPDATE students SET age = 25, first_name = 'John' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE feedback_responses SET feedback = 'Great job on the assignment!', timestamp = NOW() WHERE response_id = 1;
UPDATE survey_responses SET response = 'I strongly agree with the provided statement.', rating = 5 WHERE survey_id = 2 AND student_id = 101;
